FuncDef: This command will cause a delay in the activation of the associated IP interface by the specified number of seconds. The delay is invoked whenever the system attempts to bring the associated IP interface up, unless theinit-onlyoption is configured. If theinit-onlyoption is configured, the delay is only applied when the IP interface is first configured or after a system reboot.

ParaDef.Info: The time delay, in seconds, to make the interface operational. Values-1 to 1200.
Specifies that the down delay is only applied when the interface is configured or after a reboot. Values-1 to 1200.
